lexa.core.data

Class ArrayDataValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.data.BaseDataValue
      • lexa.core.data.ArrayDataValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DataValue>, DataFactoryItem, DataValue

    public class ArrayDataValue
extends BaseDataValue
    Implementation of DataValue for use in a ArrayDataSet

    This class manages the type conversion and keels it type safe.

    Since:
    2015-03
    Author:
    william
